column1: 1594243695888707584,1594243695888707584@_discoberry If untenable na talaga, I guess I'll have to. Symbolically, kind of a big thing din na gay marriage isn't a thing here. We look like a conventionally cis couple, pero if marriage out here doesn't include queer people, then I don't want it kasjdhakjdhasd. t_end
